Key Match Events: Klay Thompson scored back-to-back 3-pointers in the third quarter
Thompson had a crucial pass that led to a Luka Doncic triple
Post-Match Reflections: The Dallas Mavericks lost 134-127 to the Indiana Pacers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson and the Mavericks remain at home in their next two games
The Mavericks are 2-2 at American Airlines Center to start the season
Others: Klay Thompson contributed seven points, two rebounds and one assist in 16 minutes
Thompson's last basket made it 61-59 before Tyrese Haliburton's layup pushed Indiana's lead to four points at halftime
